channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2 wounded in shooting at Spartan College in Inglewood; suspect in custody
item.description: Two of the victims were believed to be female employees of the college, Inglewood's mayor told CBS News Los Angeles.

item.title: The Bathtub Murder of Kendy Howard
item.description: Did a former Idaho state trooper use his law enforcement skills to stage his wife’s death in their bathtub? "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant re...

item.title: WATCH: Boy has encounter with 'friendly' dolphin
item.description: A boy and his father had the encounter of a lifetime while fishing off the coast of Perth, Australia, when a dolphin swam up to their boat.

item.title: 2 killed when small plane crashes into Simi Valley neighborhood
item.description: Residents were inside of both homes at the time of the crash, but firefighters say they were able to make it out unharmed.

item.title: 5.4-magnitude earthquake rattles rural southeastern New Mexico, West Texas
item.description: The U.S. Geological Survey reports that the earthquake's epicenter was about 35 miles south of Whites City, New Mexico.

item.title: Katie Ledecky breaks her own world record in the 800-meter freestyle
item.description: Katie Ledecky now has the top 10 performances all-time in the event, according to USA Swimming.

item.title: Musk gets his Texas wish. SpaceX launch site approved as new city of Starbase
item.description: A vote was held Saturday to formally organize Starbase as a city.

item.title: Buffett: This year's stock market turmoil 'is really nothing'
If you see purple paint, stop walking. What your state's paint law means.
5.5 million patients' information exposed by major healthcare data breach
Portugal announces the expulsion of 18,000 foreigners ahead of a national election
At least 1 dead after pile-up crash shuts down 805 freeway
Why economists say Trump's claim of falling grocery, gas prices is misleading
item.description: "Prices are still going up," one expert said.

item.title: Warren Buffett’s best and worst investments in his 60 years leading Berkshire Hathaway
Mexico's president says she rejected Trump's plan to send US troops across the border
item.description: She says Trump proposed sending troops to help Mexico fight drug trafficking.

item.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
item.description: Buffett said he will recommend to Berkshire Hathaway’s board that Greg Abel should become CEO at the end of the year.

item.title: Musk gets his Texas wish. SpaceX launch site is approved as the new city of Starbase
Olympian charged in Florida with battery on female fellow athlete
item.description: An Olympic track medalist is charged in Florida with punching a female hurdler.
